question: Which of the following answers is NOT true about the relationship between Canada and the USA?
possible_answers: A. Canada and the USA share the longest undefended international border.
B. Canada and the USA are the largest trading partners in the world.
C. Canada exports very few goods to the USA.
D. The relationship between Canada and the USA is the closest and the most extensive in the world.
main_question: Which of the following answers is NOT true about the relationship between Canada and the USA?
answer: C. Canada exports very few goods to the USA.
